name: BUSINESS CLASS from BALI to JAKARTA | Trip Report
description:
EDIT: I flew into the new Terminal 3 at Jakarta, not Terminal 1!

Join me on the first leg of my journey from Bali to Washington, DC, USA. I took the long way back, traveling via Abu Dhabi. The first part of my trip took me from Denpasar in Bali to Jakarta with Garuda Indonesia's Business Class!

Check out my experience flying FIRST CLASS with Garuda: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sF9KHRDBju8&t=328s

Also, here's a link to the Inauguaral Flight of Delta's A350:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aFUGR0-7XWc&t=152s


Please "Like," "Comment," and "Subscribe!"

Check out my travel blog: https://greenergrass.com/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooks/

Music is "A Place Of Wonder And Beauty" by Johannes Bornl√∂f
